credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
dimensions:
H x W x D: 10.15 x 19.4 x 11.7 cm (4 1/4 x 7 7/8 x 4 5/8 in.)
Note: Width = handle to spout
title: Pitcher
provenance:
Jordan-Volpe Gallery, New York
Marcia and William Goodman
description:
Handled bowl, which resembles a sauce boat. 
Thrown red earthenware body with folded and deeply dented sides, applied curved handle, and low flat foot. Exterior covered with variegated rose-colored glaze, with streaks of brilliant green glaze. Interior glazed in mottled dark green with areas of lusterless and high luster glaze. Bottom partially glazed.
name: Pitcher
